PREFIX.description: Define a command prefix for the bot (e.g., all | . | .!*).

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Phone number(s) of the bot administrator(s) in international format (without '+'). Separate multiple numbers with a comma.

PUBLIC.description: Set bot visibility: 'public' allows anyone to use it, 'private' restricts access to the bot owner only.

AUTHOR.description: Specify the Sticker Pack author name.
